author: _mcsrousselin
title: Great hotel near the Arc De Triomphe
text: Warm welcome and professional service from the staff! The breakfast is nice and the location is quite central. Definitely going back next time I am in Paris! I think that it's good value for money too. The staff( at reception and in general)are professional and make you feel comfortable.
